post.description: Processes DonatePay access token and links the DonatePay account to the user session. Returns whether this is a new user registration.
Invalidates and removes DonatePay integration for the authenticated user. Requires authentication via cookie.
Processes DonatePay access token and links the DonatePay account to the user session. Returns whether this is a new user registration.
Invalidates and removes DonatePay integration for the authenticated user. Requires authentication via cookie.
Processes IHAQ OAuth authorization code and links the IHAQ account to the user session. Returns whether this is a new user registration.

requestBody.description: OAuth authorization code and redirect URI

post.description: Invalidates and removes IHAQ integration for the authenticated user. Requires authentication via cookie.
Creates a single unrevealed ticket for the authenticated user. Only one active ticket per user is allowed. Does not consume quota.

get.description: Returns the current unrevealed ticket for the authenticated user. Returns an object with all null values if no active ticket exists.

200.description: Active ticket or empty response with null values

post.description: Generates a random decimal number using Random.org to determine the winner from participants. Consumes daily quota (6/day). Quota is only consumed if Random.org request succeeds. Uses currently active ticket.

get.description: Public endpoint that returns the complete winner record for a specific ticket ID.
get.summary: Get winner record by ticket ID

get.description: Public endpoint that returns a paginated list of revealed tickets for a specific user. Returns only ticketId, metadata, and createdAt.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: User ID to fetch records for

get.summary: Get revealed tickets for a user

info.title: PointAuc Client API
info.description: Client-side API endpoints for PointAuc frontend applications

accessToken.description: Access token received from DonatePay OAuth flow

isNew.description: Indicates whether this authorization resulted in a new user registration

code.description: OAuth authorization code received from IHAQ

redirect_uri.description: Redirect URI used in the OAuth flow

isNew.description: Indicates whether this authorization resulted in a new user registration

ticketId.description: Random.org ticket ID - null when no active ticket

createdAt.description: Timestamp when ticket was created - null when no active ticket

quotaLeft.description: Remaining quota for today (out of 6) - null when no active ticket

participants.description: List of auction participants with their bid amounts

text.example: Random values licensed strictly for development and testing only

infoUrl.description: URL with more information about the license

previousTicketId.description: Previous ticket ID in the chain

nextTicketId.description: Next ticket ID in the chain

decimalPlaces.description: Number of decimal places in the generated values

replacement.description: Whether values are generated with replacement

data.description: Array of generated random decimal fractions

license.description: License information for the random values

userData.description: User-provided data returned with the response

completionTime.description: Timestamp when the random generation was completed

serialNumber.description: Serial number of the random generation

signature.description: Digital signature from Random.org proving authenticity

userId.description: User ID who generated this winner

fastId.description: Fast ID for quick lot identification

amount.description: Current bid amount in currency units

data.description: Array of lot data to be broadcasted

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the lots broadcast in ISO format
Timestamp of the timer broadcast in ISO format

color.description: Color assigned to the participant on the wheel (hex code)

amount.description: Bid amount or weight of the participant

originalAmount.description: Original amount of the participant. Used for the dropout wheel.

type.description: Event type indicating participants have changed
Event type indicating a wheel spin

angle.description: Final angle the wheel stopped at in degrees

duration.description: Duration of the spin animation in milliseconds

winner.description: Unique identifier of the winning participant

data.description: Wheel event data (either participants changed or spin event)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the wheel broadcast in ISO format

text.example: No duplicate bids allowed. Winner pays full amount.

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the rules broadcast in ISO format
